chat.intro: Hello! I’m your medical assistant. Tell me your symptoms via voice or text and I’ll generate a report to speed up your care.

personalizedMessages.base: I am {{pronoun}} and I am {{age}} years old
headache: {{base}} and I have intense one-sided headaches, often with nausea.
{{base}} and the pain worsens with physical effort or sudden movement.
{{base}} and I become sensitive to light and sound during attacks.
{{base}} and the headaches can last for hours or days, often throbbing.
{{base}} and painkillers don't always provide full relief.
{{base}} and I sometimes feel dizzy and have trouble concentrating.
{{base}} and I usually isolate myself in a dark room when it starts.
{{base}} and I’ve had to miss appointments due to the severity.
{{base}} and my headache episodes have been more frequent lately.
{{base}} and I often experience visual disturbances like blurry vision or flashes.
{{base}} and it starts with a pressure or tingling on one side of my head.
{{base}} and the pain is so intense it disrupts my sleep and rest.
{{base}} and sometimes it comes with neck or shoulder stiffness.
{{base}} and I notice that stress and temperature changes worsen it.
